item.title: JEE Main 2026 session 1 answer key objection window ends today on website
item.description: The NTA has released the JEE Main answer key 2026 and response sheet in PDFs. The deadline to challenge the JEE Main answer key at jeemain.nta.nic.in ...

item.title: OTT releases this week: The Raja Saab, Kis Kisko Pyaar Karoon 2 and more
item.description: This week's OTT releases, streaming in February, bring a wide range of content for viewers. From Indian entertainers and international thrillers to do...

item.title: Mohd Siraj to replace Harshit Rana in India's T20 World Cup 2026 squad
item.description: With Harshit Rana ruled out, selectors are expected to announce Mohammed Siraj as his replacement later today.

item.title: OPPO to launch Find X9s with MediaTek D 9500s in India: What to expect
item.description: Powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 9500s SoC, the OPPO Find X9s is expected to sport a 6.3-inch AMOLED display and pack a 7,000mAh battery

item.title: Canada visa curbs bite hard: 300,000 fewer foreign students in two years
item.description: Tighter visa rules and enrolment caps have pushed Canada's foreign student numbers sharply lower, with further cuts planned through 2028
